channel.title: RESTful on T-Mobile Open Source
channel.description: Recent content in RESTful on T-Mobile Open Source

item.title: Introducing Apigee API Gateway for T-Mobile's Jazz Serverless Development Platform
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that serverless (aka FaaS) developers now have a choice to expose their serverless functions as RESTful APIs from within the Jazz serverless development platform at a click of a button. If you are not aware of T-Mobile’s Jazz Serverless Development Platform, you can check it out on Github. With this integration, Jazz developers will have an option to choose between multiple API Gateway providers for their serverless functions - APIGEE & AWS API Gateway depending on their business needs & their enterprise compliance requirements.
